title: git-resources
text:
This website lists resources to learn version control of digital objects using Git and DataLad. The source repository can be found on GitHub.

If you notice any errors or have suggestions for improvements, please either open an issue or contact Lennart Wittkuhn. You can also review the data and all of the source code in this GitHub repository. Thank you!
